content.question: Based on the information provided above, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: Home Nation has an absolute advantage in the production of computers.
Foreign Nation has an absolute advantage in the production of autos.
Home Nation has a comparative advantage in the production of autos.
Foreign Nation has a comparative advantage in the production of computers.
Neither nation has a comparative advantage.

content.answer: Home Nation has an absolute advantage in the production of computers.
